state1.name: Open Menu
state1.description: Open the application menu to access various settings and options.

state1.name: Forward
state1.description: Navigate forward to the next page in the browser history.

state1.name: Bookmark
state1.description: Add the current webpage to your bookmarks for easy access later.

state1.name: Download
state1.description: Initiate a download of the content currently being viewed.

state1.name: Page Info
state1.description: View detailed information about the current webpage.

state1.name: Refresh
state1.description: Reload the current webpage to update its content.

state1.name: New Tab
state1.description: Open a new browsing tab to start a fresh session.

state1.name: New Incognito Tab
state1.description: Open a new incognito tab for private browsing without saving history.

state1.name: Open History
state1.description: View the browsing history to find previously visited pages.

state1.name: Delete Browsing Data
state1.description: Remove saved browsing data such as history, cache, and cookies.

state1.name: Downloads
state1.description: Access and manage all downloaded files within the browser.

state1.name: Bookmarks
state1.description: View and manage all saved bookmarks for easy access to favorite sites.

state1.name: Recent Tabs
state1.description: Access a list of tabs recently closed or synced from other devices.

state1.name: Share
state1.description: Share the current webpage with others through various communication channels.

state1.name: Find in Page
state1.description: Search for specific text within the current webpage.

state1.name: Translate
state1.description: Translate the current webpage to another language.

state1.name: Listen to This Page
state1.description: Use text-to-speech to listen to the content of the current page.

state1.name: Add to Home Screen
state1.description: Create a shortcut to the current webpage on your device's home screen.

state1.name: Desktop Site
state1.description: Request the desktop version of the current site if you're viewing it on a mobile device.

state1.name: Get Image Descriptions
state1.description: Retrieve and view descriptions for images on the current page, useful for accessibility.

ed47e9d25a33b1b30d4131b189f400fb.name: Manage Activity
ed47e9d25a33b1b30d4131b189f400fb.description: Allows you to view and manage your activities on the platform, including browsing history and interactions.

ed47e9d25a33b1b30d4131b189f400fb.description: Enables you to customize and manage the topics and interests you follow or are suggested on the platform.

ed47e9d25a33b1b30d4131b189f400fb.description: Provides access to additional information and resources about the platform or feature you are using.

ed47e9d25a33b1b30d4131b189f400fb.description: Gives the option to disable certain features or settings within the application.

2a95dec76f2e1596d1ef5ca517a482a3.name: YouTube Search

2a95dec76f2e1596d1ef5ca517a482a3.description: Use voice commands to search for content in YouTube.

4da1853954016fea3c7e3737a488a71c.name: Search

de9c8163e50c33335cdc769ce901e774.description: Enables the user to adjust privacy settings according to their preferences.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Initiate a voice search by clicking the microphone button.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Navigate to Home
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the Home button to return to the home page.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Open Main Menu
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the button to open the main menu.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Access Google Account
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on the Google account button to view account details or switch accounts.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: View Search Settings
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on the settings button to modify search settings.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: View Filter Options
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on the filter options to refine search results based on specific criteria.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on any filter category like 'Video', 'Shopping', 'News', etc., to refine results.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: View Detailed Information
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the button to view more information about a specific search result.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: View External Link
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on an external link to open the referenced webpage, e.g., GitHub or CSDN blog.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Provide Feedback
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the feedback button to submit feedback about the search results.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the search tools button to access advanced search options.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Update Location
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the update location button to refresh or update your current location.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Navigate to Google Play
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the Google Play link to visit the Google Play Store.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: View Google Play App Information
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on a result from Google Play to view detailed information about an app.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Show Experimental Features
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click on experimental feature options or tools to explore additional functionalities.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: View Page Footer
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Scroll to the bottom of the page to view footer links and information.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Enable Notifications
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the button to allow notifications for updates related to your search.

c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.name: Download Data
c441f975f367313d74285cf38ee58d89.description: Click the download button to export search results or data.

a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.name: Open New Tab
a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.description: Opens a new tab in the browser by clicking the 'New tab' button.

a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.name: Customize and Control
a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.description: Accesses Chrome's customization and control options by clicking the 'Customize and control Google Chrome' button.

a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.name: Close Tab
a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.description: Closes the current tab by clicking on the 'Close New tab tab' button.

a1c93982f450227f94a1c765fdaa693f.description: Displays the list of opened tabs in the browser using the 'tab_list_recycler_view' component.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: View News Item
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: View a specific news item, such as 'Evidence of ‘Negative Time’ Found in Quantum Physics Experiment' or 'Google’s New Gmail App Password Rules—You Have 24 Hours To Comply'.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Share News Item
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Share a specific news item using the share button, such as sharing 'Evidence of ‘Negative Time’ Found in Quantum Physics Experiment'.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Open Card Menu
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Open the card menu for a specific news item, such as 'Card menu Evidence of ‘Negative Time’ Found in Quantum Physics Experiment', which typically provides more options like saving, sharing, or other actions.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Scroll News Feed
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Scroll through the news feed to view different articles and updates. The feed contains articles from various sources like 'Scientific American' and 'Forbes'.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Search URL
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Use the search bar to type or search for a URL or specific query.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Voice Search
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Initiate voice search by tapping the microphone button, allowing users to search with voice commands.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Search with Google Lens
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Use the camera to search for objects, text, or images using Google Lens, which is activated by the camera button.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Open Navigation Bar
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Open the navigation bar for quick access to the menu, search, or other system controls.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: View Status Bar
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: View the status bar, which shows icons for Wi-Fi, battery, and other system status indicators.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Navigate Back
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Use the back navigation button to go back to the previous page or screen.

5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.name: Open Menu
5433a62b362c2091d58a1702207ef633.description: Tap on the menu anchor to open the menu, providing options for other actions and settings.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Reload the current webpage to refresh its content.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: New tab
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Open a new tab in the browser for additional browsing sessions.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: New Incognito tab
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Open a new Incognito tab for private browsing sessions without storing history.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: History
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Access the browsing history to view previously visited web pages.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: Delete browsing data
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Clear the browsing data, including history, cache, and cookies.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: Recent tabs
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Access recently closed tabs and reopen them if needed.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: Settings
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Configure the browser settings and preferences to customize the browsing experience.

c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.name: Help & feedback
c22707ef795c84f9d5b86771cdeb3175.description: Access help resources and provide feedback to improve the browser.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Device Picker
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Displays a list of devices to share a tab with. Users can swipe down to close this interface.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Send to Device
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Allows users to send a tab to selected devices from the device picker list.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Device Management
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Users can manage their devices linked to their account, with options to view activity status.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Search Box
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Allows users to search or type a URL directly.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Voice Search
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Initiates a search using the user's voice input, providing a convenient hands-free option.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Google Lens Search
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Enables users to search using their camera with Google Lens, integrating image recognition into search.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Quick Navigation Tiles
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Provides quick access to frequently visited sites such as YouTube, Facebook, or Wikipedia through predefined tiles.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Options for Discover
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Opens a menu with additional options related to content in the Discover feed.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Share Content
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Allows users to share articles or posts from the Discover feed with others.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Home Button
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Navigates the user back to the homepage of the browser.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Tab Switcher
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Enables users to switch between, view, or close open tabs in their browser session.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Settings Access
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Provides access to the settings menu where users can customize browser preferences and view account information.

220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.name: Main Menu
220698341cb903085d956760b38d76a0.description: Opens a menu for users to customize and control various settings and features in Google Chrome.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Open Preferences
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Opens a menu to adjust settings and preferences for the application or page.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Open the home page
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Navigates to the predefined home page of the browser or application.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Bookmark this page
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Adds the currently viewed page to bookmarks for easy access in the future.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Switch or close tabs
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Switches between open tabs or closes existing tabs within the browser or application.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Customize and control Google Chrome
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Opens a menu with options to customize and control various settings in Google Chrome, including but not limited to bookmarks, settings, and extensions.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Search
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Initiates a search function within the application or webpage to find specific content.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Subscribe
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Subscribes to a newsletter or service, often after inputting an email address.

46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.name: Begin the survey
46b6ba6ad81aa0f1b3a4bdba4d9ab204.description: Starts a survey to collect information or feedback from the user.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: Share
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Allows the user to share content, possibly using different methods or platforms.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: Close
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Closes the current panel or dialog, exiting out of the current view or canceling the current operation.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: Download
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Initiates a download of the content or file that is currently being viewed or shared.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: QR Code View Page
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Displays the page where a QR Code is shown, allowing others to scan it for sharing purposes.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: QR Code
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Displays a QR Code that people nearby can scan to access shared content directly.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: Error Message
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Displays an error message when an operation fails or a problem occurs in the application.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: Status Bar Background
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Represents the background area of the status bar, possibly displaying device status information.

061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.name: Navigation Bar Background
061f07907da96b8f9eef4400fed09543.description: Represents the background area of the navigation bar, containing navigation controls.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Open Lens View
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Access the Lens view container to use the Google Lens functionalities.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: View Promo Banner
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Check any promotional banners available in the promo banner container.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Interact with Lens Content
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Engage with the content available in the Lens content area, possibly images or text to analyze.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Manage Lens Settings
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Adjust lens-related settings within the coordinator container.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Display Lens Error Message
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: View any error messages when Lens encounters issues, shown in the error message container.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Access Action Menu
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Open the action menu which might contain additional options or settings.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Use Magnifier
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Activate the magnifier container for a closer view of elements on-screen.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Use Camera
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Capture images or videos through the camera fragment container for processing with Google Lens.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Open Lens Gallery
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: View and select images from the Lens gallery to analyze or search.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Toggle Filter Options
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Switch between various filter settings for specific Lens modes.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Select Image from Gallery
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Choose an image from the gallery using the picker button for Lens analysis.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Use Shutter Button
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Capture a new image using the shutter button view for immediate analysis.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Navigate Overlay Buttons
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Utilize overlay buttons for actions such as closing, going back, or accessing more options.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Search with Camera
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Enable the feature to search for objects using the phone's camera directly within the app.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Translate Text
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Use Lens to translate text from an image in the Translate mode of filters.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Review Search History
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Access past searches performed with Lens in the history button container.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Adjust Flash
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Toggle the flash settings for better visibility in low light conditions when using the camera.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Engage with Google Lens Features
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Further interact with the features, like recognizing objects or extracting text, provided by Google Lens.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Manage Overlays
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Handle multiple overlays that might present additional information or settings on top of the visual interface.

1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.name: Explore Other Options
1066043e315f82031c99d60bbec1155d.description: Utilize the overflow menu to explore more options or settings within the app.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Search
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Initiate a search query via a text input or voice command.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Microphone
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Activate or deactivate the microphone for voice search or transcription.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Stop Listening
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Stop the ongoing voice transcription or listening activity.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Transcription Display
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: View the transcription of the voice input or search query.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Change Language
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Change the language settings for the transcription or voice search.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Google Logo
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Tap the Google logo to reset or clear the search input.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Sound Levels
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Adjust or monitor sound levels during the voice search or transcription.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Visual Mic Indicator
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: View the microphone's visual status or indicator during the transcription or voice search process.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Voice Recognizer
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Activate the voice recognizer to process and convert spoken words into text.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Intent API
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Interact with the backend API for processing voice search intents or commands.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Text Input
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: Enter or modify text for search purposes in the search box.

2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.name: Search Result Display
2649f441ba60cfa77804bbba2e214a2c.description: View the results or suggestions from a voice or text search.

state7.name: Sort and View Options
state7.description: Tap on the 'Sort and view options' button to modify how bookmarks are displayed, possibly sorting them by name, date, etc.

state7.name: Create New Folder
state7.description: Tap on the 'Create new folder' button to create a new folder for organizing bookmarks.

state7.name: Close Dialog
state7.description: Tap on the 'Close dialog' button to close any open dialog window or menu.

state7.name: Search Bookmarks
state7.description: Use the 'Search your bookmarks' button to find specific bookmarks by entering keywords or phrases.

state7.name: Access Mobile Bookmarks
state7.description: Tap on the 'Mobile bookmarks' button to view the list of bookmarks saved under this category.

state7.name: Access Other Bookmarks
state7.description: Tap on the 'Other bookmarks' button to view the list of bookmarks saved under this category.

state7.name: Access Reading List
state7.description: Tap on the 'Reading list' button to view your list of saved pages, noting how many are unread.

state8.name: Sort and View Options
state8.description: Access sorting and viewing options to organize bookmarks or lists.

state8.name: Create New Folder
state8.description: Create a new folder to organize bookmarks or other content.

state8.name: Close Dialog
state8.description: Close the current dialog or window that is open.

state8.name: Search Bookmarks
state8.description: Search through your bookmarks using a search bar.

state8.name: Options for saved pages
state8.description: Access options or additional actions for the article saved.

state2.name: Navigate Up
state2.description: Use the button to navigate up or back to the previous screen.

state2.name: Access Settings
state2.description: Interact with settings options, including Payment methods, Addresses and more, Privacy and security, Safety check, Notifications, Theme, Advanced, and more.

state2.name: Help & Feedback
state2.description: Press the Help & Feedback button to get assistance or provide feedback about the application.

state2.name: View Payment Methods
state2.description: Access and manage your saved payment methods.

state2.name: Manage Addresses
state2.description: View and edit your saved addresses.

state2.name: Perform Safety Check
state2.description: Run a safety check to ensure the security of the application and data.

state2.name: Change Theme
state2.description: Select and change the application's theme.

state2.name: Advanced Settings
state2.description: Access advanced settings for further configuration.

state2.description: Define or change the homepage setting.

state2.name: New Tab Page Cards
state2.description: Configure cards displayed on the new tab page.

state2.description: Create and configure shortcuts on the toolbar for quick access.

state2.name: Accessibility Settings
state2.description: Adjust accessibility settings for easier use.

state2.name: Site Settings

state3.name: Navigate Up
state3.description: Click on the 'Navigate up' button to go back to the previous screen or section.

state3.name: Open Menu
state3.description: Click on the 'Help & Feedback' button to open a help menu or feedback options.

state3.name: Access Settings
state3.description: Click on the text 'Settings' to open the settings page for further configuration.

state3.name: Toggle Safety Check
state3.description: Click on the 'Safety check' option to open or configure safety settings related to the browser.

state3.name: View Notifications
state3.description: Click on the 'Notifications' option to view and manage your notifications.

state3.name: Change Theme
state3.description: Click on the 'Theme' option to change or select the browser's appearance theme.

state3.name: Open Advanced Settings
state3.description: Click on the 'Advanced' option to access advanced settings and configurations.

state3.name: Manage Tabs
state3.description: Click on the 'Tabs' option to view, open, or manage your browser tabs.

state3.name: Set Homepage
state3.description: Click on the 'Homepage' option to configure or modify the browser’s homepage.

state3.name: Enable/Disable New Tab Page Cards
state3.description: Click on the 'New tab page cards' option to toggle the visibility of cards on the new tab page.

state3.name: Set Toolbar Shortcut
state3.description: Click on the 'Toolbar shortcut' option to customize the shortcut options available on the toolbar.

state3.name: Access Accessibility Settings
state3.description: Click on the 'Accessibility' option to adjust settings for users with disabilities or special needs.

state3.name: Open Site Settings
state3.description: Click on the 'Site settings' option to configure settings specific to the websites you visit.

state3.name: Change Language Preferences
state3.description: Click on the 'Languages' option to set or change language preferences for the browser.

state3.name: Manage Downloads
state3.description: Click on the 'Downloads' option to view or manage your browser download history.

state3.name: View About Chrome
state3.description: Click on the 'About Chrome' option to view the version of Chrome you are using, along with other browser details.

state3.name: Scroll Content
state3.description: Scroll through the content area to explore additional options or settings listed on the page.

state3.name: View List Container
state3.description: Interact with the list container to view or select items listed within it.

state3.name: Interact with Recycler View
state3.description: Click on individual items within the recycler view to explore further options or configurations.

state3.name: Interact with Navigation Bar
state3.description: Click or perform actions on the navigation bar area to manage or adjust navigation functions.

state4.name: Navigate Up
state4.description: Navigate back to the previous screen or menu.

state4.name: Help & Feedback
state4.description: Access help and feedback options for assistance or to provide feedback about the application.

state4.name: English Options
state4.description: View additional settings or options for the English language.

state4.name: Chinese (Simplified) Options
state4.description: View additional settings or options for the Chinese (Simplified) language.

state4.name: Chinese Options
state4.description: View additional settings or options for the Chinese language.

state4.name: Add Language
state4.description: Add a new language to the list of preferred languages, allowing websites to display content in that language.

state4.name: Translation Settings
state4.description: Configure options related to translations, such as offering to send pages in other languages to Google Translate.

state4.name: Advanced Translation Options
state4.description: Manage advanced translation settings, including enabling automatic translation or choosing not to offer translation for certain languages.

state5.name: Navigate up
state5.description: Navigate to the previous screen by clicking the 'Navigate up' button (ID: 4).

state5.name: Open Help & Feedback
state5.description: Open the Help & Feedback section by clicking the 'Help & Feedback' button (ID: 6).

state5.name: View Privacy and Security Settings
state5.description: View the Privacy and Security options like 'Delete browsing data', 'Privacy Guide', 'Third-party cookies', etc.

state5.name: Delete Browsing Data
state5.description: Access the option to delete browsing history, cookies, site data, and cache under 'Delete browsing data' (ID: 11).

state5.name: Access Privacy Guide
state5.description: Review key privacy and security controls by selecting the 'Privacy Guide' (ID: 13).

state5.name: Manage Third-Party Cookies
state5.description: Adjust settings related to third-party cookies under the 'Third-party cookies' section (ID: 15).

state5.name: Customize Ad Privacy
state5.description: Manage ad privacy settings, including customizing the information used by sites to show ads (ID: 17).

state5.name: Send Do Not Track Request
state5.description: Toggle the 'Do Not Track' request option under 'Send a “Do Not Track” request' (ID: 19).

state5.name: Manage Preload Pages
state5.description: Adjust preloading options under 'Preload pages' (ID: 21) to set the desired preloading behavior.

state5.name: Lock Incognito Tabs
state5.description: Enable or disable the option to lock Incognito tabs when leaving Chrome under 'Lock Incognito tabs when you leave Chrome' (ID: 23).

state5.name: Toggle Safe Browsing
state5.description: Enable or disable the Safe Browsing feature for enhanced protection under the 'Safe Browsing' section (ID: 28).

state5.name: Access Navigation Bar
state5.description: Access and interact with the navigation bar background (ID: 30), typically used for navigating between app sections.

state5.name: Toggle Settings Switch
state5.description: Toggle the settings switch for specific options in the menu (ID: 26), typically for enabling or disabling a feature.

state5.name: View Content
state5.description: Interact with the main content area that displays options like 'Privacy', 'Security', 'Ad privacy', etc. (ID: 7, ID: 9).

state5.name: View Additional Privacy Options
state5.description: View other privacy-related options such as 'Privacy Guide', 'Third-party cookies', and 'Send a Do Not Track request' (IDs 14, 16, 18).

state6.name: Navigate Up
state6.description: Use the 'Navigate up' button to go back to the previous screen or to a higher-level menu in the Chrome settings.

state6.name: Help & Feedback
state6.description: Access 'Help & feedback' to get assistance with using Chrome or to provide feedback about your experience.

state6.name: Toggle Preload Pages
state6.description: Manage preloading pages setting to enable or disable standard preloading options for quicker browsing.

state6.name: Toggle Lock Incognito Tabs
state6.description: Enable or disable the option to lock incognito tabs when you leave Chrome, requiring screen lock to access them again.

state6.name: Toggle Safe Browsing
state6.description: Change safe browsing settings to adjust protection levels against harmful content while browsing.

state6.name: Toggle Secure Connections
state6.description: Control the setting that prioritizes the use of secure connections (HTTPS) and warns you about sites that do not support it.

state6.name: Toggle Secure DNS
state6.description: Adjust the setting for using a secure DNS, which is set to automatic by default for enhanced security.

state6.name: Toggle Phone as Security Key
state6.description: Enable or disable the use of your phone as a security key for controlling which devices can sign in with your credentials.

state6.name: Toggle Access Payment Methods
state6.description: Allow or restrict sites from being able to check if you have payment methods saved in your Chrome profile.
